results.title: Advantages and Disadvantages of TypeScript over JavaScript
results.snippet: What is Typescript? TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript, designed to improve the development of simple JavaScript code by adding static typing, classes, and interfaces. This optional static typing allows for better code organization and object-oriented programming techniques.

results.title: TypeScript, What Good For?. The Pros and Cons of TypeScript: A… | by Chaewonkong | Medium
results.snippet: TypeScript offers many benefits, such as type safety, improved tooling, scalability, and enhanced features like interfaces and generics. However, it also comes with some drawbacks, such as a learning curve, increased compile time, a smaller ecosystem, and potential compatibility issues.
